title: The Books Books and Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, International, Organic, Western, Salad bar, Beer/Wine
description: A vegetarian cafe/bookstore. Serves a range of vegan and gluten free food, including in-house-made cakes (vegan), daily specials, organic wines, espresso, over 30 varieties of tea residue-controlled and more. Free Wi-Fi. Countless newspapers, magazines and books to read. Has a large sun terrace.
